description: This amazing dressing packs a lot of flavor into very few calories! If youâ€™re worried that this low-fat vegan dressing might be too hot for you, blend up all the ingredients except the chipotle powder; then add it little by little, tasting as you go, until you find the right amount of spiciness.
keywords: chipotle dressing, oil-free dressing, wfpb dressing
name: Holy Moly Spicy Chipotle Dressing
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup plain unsweetened soy milk (or other non-dairy milk)
1/4 of 1 medjool date (pitted (or a pinch of sweetener of choice)
1 teaspoon white miso (or salt to taste)
1 teaspoon tomato powder (or 2 teaspoons tomato paste)
1/2 teaspoon chipotle chili powder or chipotle chiles in adobo (or to taste)
additional milk or water as needed

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend on high speed until smooth. Let it sit for a minute and then check the thickness. However thick it is now, it will be much thicker after refrigerating, so add more non-dairy milk or water to thin it, if necessary.
Pour into a bottle or jar and refrigerate to thicken and allow flavors to develop.
